Welcome

Hi, my name is Phili Day and I build things for phones. I am a software engineer based in London, UK, currently focusing on iOS applications.

Get Started

About me

Hey! I'm Phili, a software engineer based in London. Shortly after graduating from Bristol University with a BSc in Biology and an MSc in Computer Science (conversion) I joined Tigerspike on a software engineer internship. I am now a full time software engineer here focusing on iOS engineering. A few technologies I have worked with during my studies and work: iOS - Swift Android - Java HTML & CSS ReactNative. Some things I enjoy outside of work is running, cycling, camping, snowboarding and reading.
